com.alphatrader.rest

Class Bond

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alphatrader.rest.Bond

  • public class Bond
extends Object
    Represents a bond in the game. Contains factory methods to handle API communication as well.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Christopher Guckes (christopher.guckes@torq-dev.de)
